questions.question: What will happen if Resistor is not used?

answers.a: Excessive current might damage the Raspberry Pi or burn out the LED.
answers.b: If an excessive amount of electricity is transmitted, nothing will happen to the Raspberry Pi or the LED.
answers.c: If too much electricity is put through, the Raspberry Pi and LED will cease operating after a while.
answers.d: Excess current has no effect on the Raspberry Pi; however, the LED will cease operating
